version_description:
This application is the mobile client for NEXON HR Self-Service Solution.
If your employer uses the NEXON HR solution, you have the opportunity to view your
- payslips,
- schedule,
- attendance sheets
- factual and planned absences, and
- employee information.
With the application you can
- request absence, schedule or personal data changes,
- submit motion events to your attendance list.
As a manager, you can assess your subordinates’ submited requests.
Also you can receive notifications on your mobile phone from the HR system.

To use the application with your data, your employer must obtain the necessary license and make the appropriate IT settings.
With the built-in "Demo" function you can test the application using test data!
